phrases: Hey, all you viewers out there!
When you are watchin' Fairy Tail, keep the room nice and bright,
and sit back from the screen,'kay?
It is said to be a mysterious forest that holds magical powers.
Why do I have to go fishing with you when I am busy writing my novel?
Well you were getting in a funk'because you could not think of any good ideas, right?
When that happens you should go out for a change of pace.
Because fish are my bread and butter.
Why should I have to fish up your favorite food?
What the heck does upa mean anyway?!
Enjoying themselves as usual, I see.
That is right, we can do it!
Let us go for even more who-knows-what!!
The door to mystery is right in front of us
This excitement gets my heart racing
Why cannot I see tomorrow, I wonder?
The only part leveling up is my curiosity
We cannot just throw away our daily life together, right?
Living itself will be our training!
Let us search for even more who-knows-what!
We cannot be satisfied with just the normal answers
We will do our best living our life
Um, you are not a little kid,'kay?
I wanted to eat it raw!
You should catch your own big one.
This is not a sports drama, you know.
You keep up that tough guy act, and you will never get a girl to like you.
This is the Fairy Tail Archives.
I am sorting some old materials.
I would be happy to have your help.
So, do not you think Natsu was being a jerk?
But that is what makes him cute.
You also like Natsu's childlike side.
I am not really used to this.
Is this everyone when they were kids?
So this is Gray, and next to him is Cana.
That kid with the spiky head's Natsu, right?
He has not changed a bit.
How did Natsu and Happy meet in the first place anyway?
That was right after I joined Fairy Tail...
Back then Natsu and Gray would start fighting whenever they saw each other.
And the one who stopped them from fighting...
You want a piece of me?!
Do not get in stupid fights again.
I will get you next time.
That is how Natsu was, but other than fighting, he did not do much else.
Sometimes he would get this really lonely look on his face.
One day I will beat the crap outta you both!
Where in the world did you get that?
I picked it up in the East Forest!
Natsu is good for something after all.
I am going to hatch it!
Just look at the strange markings.
They look like a dragon's talons!
What are you saying, you dimwit!
In this world, there is no magic that defames life!
Life is given birth from love.
And no magic can change that!
I do not get you at all.
In other words, if you want to hatch it, you should work hard at it yourself.
Since the only thing you usually do is destroy stuff,
this is an excellent chance for you to learn how to give birth to something.
We will continue where we left off!
Now that you mention it, we have not finished things, have we...
You are like a totally different person!
And you even picked a fight with Erza?
I will make you cry, Mirajane!
Way to lower the bar, guys...
And Erza was telling us not to fight...
I will beat up the both of ya one day!
You keep up that tough guy act, and you will never get a girl to like you.
Is it okay if I help you raise the egg together?
Raising an egg looks like fun.
Uh, is it really raising it?
What should we do to make it hatch?
If you heat it that much it will burn!
Just leave it to my magic.
Why do not I try warming it like this?
Lisanna can use a full body Take Over, but I cannot...
Even though we are on the same team...
You use the same magic as her.
If I could use it, then I could turn into a bird and search for my parakeet...
I had one as a pet, but I lost it...
I wish I had an egg like that.
I do not think he is changed much.
This is starting to get uncomfortable...
So we just do this and wait?
But that is kind of boring.
Wait, maybe the egg wants you to keep it warm, Natsu.
So, you want to be with me?
That is got to be it!
Hey, why do not we make a home for the egg?
Does it really have to be cool?
Making a house is tricky, is not it?
All I can do is break stuff!
It is pretty spacious when you get inside.
Anyway, let us have a seat.
We are almost like a family.
What is that supposed to mean?
Well, there is a daddy and a mommy and a baby, right?
Yeah, I guess that is not so bad.
Let us warm up the egg together.
Something like that would not exist.
Natsu did say that he was raised by a dragon.
They made a secret base and are playing with the egg in it.
Man, to be a kid again.
What is the big idea, Mirajane?
You are a really dangerous dude, you know that?
I would been wondering why she had not been home lately...
How dare she make nice with someone on Erza's side!
What do you mean, Erza's side?
So this is where you picked up the egg?
It fell down from this tree.
Also known as a Forest Vulcan.
And by the way, its favorite food is...
How about eating some of my fist!
If I am the dad, then I got to protect you two, right?
And I am the son of a dragon!
I cannot lose to no monkey, damn it!
This monkey is fighting with his bare hands, so I am going to beat him that way!
I will cover you with white paint and throw you back to Mt. Hakobe!
The rain is not stopping, is it?
What do you do for meals?
I eat them at the guild.
That is why I do work.
I feel kind of sorry for you.
How about I make something for you?
Well, not as good as my sister Mira.
You are saying Mira actually cooks?
For some reason, I can see that.
Actually, it fits a bit too perfectly...
I will not give you the egg!
It is going to be Igneel's kid!
Do not even joke about cooking it!
I am also looking forward to when it hatches.
That is why I am helping you.
What did you go scarin' me like that for?
I cannot wait for it to hatch!
You are usually so out of control, but you can be kind and cute...
What are you talkin' about all of a sudden?
But you seem like you really love children, and you are dependable...
You know, that thing Gramps talked about...
Are not you the ignorant one here, Natsu?
I cannot beat her in an argument!
I wish this instant would last forever...
I do not know anything about that.
Hey, are not you being presumptuous here?
Mira, do you know where the egg is?
Natsu, did not you eat it yourself?
I are not going to hold back!
I do not want to think about what the guild's going to be like in a few years.
They fight because they realize their opponent is worth fighting.
They see themselves clearly reflected in one another.
There is nothing to worry about.
I said I am not crying!
Now hurry up and give back the egg already!
I told ya, it are not me!
You are always eatin' a ton!
Now that I think about it, Elfman said something about wanting an egg like that.
It was cold at night, and you toss and turn, so you let go of the egg.
I cannot use magic very well, but I secretly warmed the egg myself.
So that is what it was.
Elfman, you are a real man!
I was pretty sure it was a red parakeet, but...
Everyone was so on edge before, but now everyone is happy!
He is like a bluebird of happiness!
Then I will name him Happy!
Guess I will paint a dragon.
The worse they fight, the closer they are, you know?
So this is Erza, and this is Laxus...
I wonder why she is not here anymore?
Do not say it like I was hogging them all!
You are supposed to protect the mom and the kid, right?
Hey, what are you talking about?
We are family, so there will be times we clash.
After all, Happy is our kid, right?
She just said something crazy with a straight face!
Do not talk while holding your tongue!
You are just as naive as ever.
I have made up my mind.
I am never speaking to Natsu again!
Well that is going to be a problem.
What will I do with this?
I wonder if they made up?
I guess I will go check on'them.
chasing after your profile left only in my revolving dreams
You said, I never want to see your face again, when you left me
But the tears on your cheek said it all
Every time you felt like you would be swallowed up in the waves of contradiction
you always held back your tears, you know?
What a strong person, they said, but everyone overestimated you
and before you knew it you lost sight of who you really are
Then the sun I thought would always be near me collapsed
Rubbing out the truths and the lies of one day, altogether
still, ironically, chasing after your profile in my revolving dreams
Today I will be telling you the secrets behind Wizard Guilds!
In this world there are all kinds of official guilds and dark guilds.
Watch for the guild mark that wizards have somewhere on their body that shows which guild they are from.
And this time will be the final lecture!
Whoa there... Fairy Tail's all busted up!
This has got to be Erza's doing!
She must have been hungry and run amuck!
It is a miracle that the building's even still standing.
So... maybe we should steer clear for now...
She is like the shadow ruler of Fairy Tail...
But if one day Erza becomes Fairy Tail's master...
